name: castle-game-engine
description: VSCode extension for Castle Game Engine

castleGameEngine.enginePath.markdowndescription: Path to the Castle Game Engine location. Leave blank to load from an environment variable (`CASTLE_ENGINE_PATH`).

castleGameEngine.pascalLanguageServer.PP.markdownDescription: Path to Free Pascal compiler (e.g. `/usr/local/bin/fpc`). Leave blank to load from an environment variable (`PP`).

castleGameEngine.pascalLanguageServer.FP.markdownDescription: Path to Free Pascal sources (e.g. `/usr/local/share/fpcsrc`). Leave blank to load from an environment variable (`FPCDIR`).

castleGameEngine.pascalLanguageServer.LA.markdownDescription: Path to Lazarus sources (e.g. `/usr/local/share/lazsrc`). Leave blank to load from an environment variable (`LAZARUSDIR`).

castleGameEngine.pascalLanguageServer.FP.markdownDescription: Target platform (`windows`, `linux`, `darwin`). Leave blank for autodetection.
Target CPU (e.g. `x86_64`). Leave blank for autodetection.
